---
title: "US News Rankings"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=F}
library(dplyr, verbose = F)
library(stringr, verbose = F)
df = read.csv('usnr.csv')
```

## Statistics

```{r echo=T}
df2 <- df %>% filter(str_detect(University, 'Statistic')) %>% 
arrange(Rank) %>% 
mutate(Rank2 = rank(Rank, ties.method = 'min')) %>%
select(-X)
knitr::kable(df2)
```

## Biostatistics

```{r echo=T}
df2 <- df %>% filter(str_detect(University, 'Bio.+|Epi.+|Health')) %>% 
arrange(Rank) %>% 
mutate(Rank2 = rank(Rank, ties.method = 'min')) %>%
select(-X)
knitr::kable(df2)
```
